## hpr3454 :: Engineering Notation

 Engineering Notation
Learn this table

 giga G 109  1,000,000,000
 mega M 106      1,000,000
 kilo k 103          1,000
                         1
milli m 10−3             0.001
micro μ 10−6             0.000,001
 nano n 10−9             0.000,000,001
 pico p 10−12            0.000,000,000,001
